A Walk In The Woods.notes: The walking speed is very slow in the main game, this rating is based on the beta version available on Steam:

rating_info.walking_speed_realism: The walking speed in the game is realistic and matches the user’s speed on the treadmill. (3 points)
rating_info.world_size: The game has one large-sized world that is easy to navigate. (3 points)
rating_info.responsiveness: The game is responsive to the user’s movements with minimal delays or inaccuracies. (3 points)
rating_info.sprinting: The sprinting mechanics are responsive and realistic (3 points)
rating_info.sprinting_mechanic: The game supports sprinting and you do not have to press any button to sprint (3 points)
rating_info.decoupled_head_body: The game supports decoupled head/body walking by default.
